question: What are Quality Attribute Checklists used for?
Quality attribute checklists have typically two types of requirements:
What is the purpose of checking software architecture thought experiments?
How would you classify the Cost and Confidence of doing a Back-of-the-envelope analysis?
How would you classify the Cost and Confidence of doing a Checklist analysis?
How would you classify the Cost and Confidence of doing a Simulation analysis?
How would you classify the Cost and Confidence of doing a Analytic model analysis?
How would you classify the Cost and Confidence of doing a Prototype analysis?
How would you classify the Cost and Confidence of doing an Experiment analysis?
